game_description: The checkered flag is about to drop on an exciting Virtual Reality racing experience! Get in the drivers‚Äô seat and race against other opponents in your own customized kart. Race through stunning tracks, collect power ups and use weapons to gain the upper hand over other racers. VR Karts is a fun and approachable Virtual Reality racing game. Let‚Äôs race! review_1: you are all a bit too naughty with this game. it is an outdated game but obviously it runs smoothly, the hands could be better and be attached to the arms, the player's body if you move backwards has no head, here too you could make the whole body move and not show a headless body if you move behind. for the rest it's a simple little game that's cheap, easy, also and above all suitable for children I imagine, but even an adult can do it for a little while, keep it for what it costs and let someone do a few rounds

review_4: This is a fun, bright racing game i suggest for calm players on vr. It‚Äôs not as fast as the other racing games on quest 2, but I still recommend it. The boost system is not the best when it comes to limitation, I think it at least could charge up over time. This is a good stay in position kind of game, and i recommend the game.
